General.Name: Batla Minerals SA
General.Description: Batla Minerals SA operates as a resource investment company in southern Africa region. The company focuses on contract mining and developing its own mining assets. It has two diamond projects, including Let"eng mine "contract mining, and Kolo mine, which is in trial phase. The company is based in Le Crès, France. Batla Minerals SA operates as a subsidiary of Garfield B.V.
General.Address: 1 Rue de la Sauvagine, Le Crès, France, 34920
